Source.Name: fan2go
Source.Summary: Simple daemon providing dynamic fan speed control based on temperature sensors
Source.Description: A simple daemon providing dynamic fan speed control based on temperature sensors. fan2go relies on lm-sensors to get both temperature and RPM sensor readings, as well as PWM controls, so it needs to be set up first.
